about_the_game:
After a war in hell, you and your big brother have been kicked out of hell by the new demon king, and there is only one way to get back, cross the magical door that connects the surface world with hell, but to do that you have to get there first! And you'll need the help of the masks, powerful magical devices that enhance your abilities.

Explore a world where hell and the surface world are connected by a magical door and meet all sorts of people inhabiting this new strange world!
detailed_description:
After a war in hell, you and your big brother have been kicked out of hell by the new demon king, and there is only one way to get back, cross the magical door that connects the surface world with hell, but to do that you have to get there first! And you'll need the help of the masks, powerful magical devices that enhance your abilities.

Explore a world where hell and the surface world are connected by a magical door and meet all sorts of people inhabiting this new strange world!

linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: Monterey
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Soulchild

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 4460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Soulchild is a 2D storydriven platformer with metroidvania elements. Follow Silk in his journey to explore the surface world and find the masks, artifacts that enhance his abilities and will aid him to go back home!
